name: A place to call home (Phileo)
description:
I'm new to the visual novel making scene, and I'm very excited (and honestly also very scared) about all these new wonders (lol). This is a solo project made by myself, and it took nearly 4 months to practice drawing sprites and learn how to script and write. 

I'm very passionate about writing stories, and I hope I can make the same Impact to everyone as the stories that I've read have made me. 

Extra Notes (supporting me etc...?)

To be honest, I'm not even sure if this game passes the standards. But I'll think about making a Patreon page with perks and whatnot IF I think the responses for the game are enough for me to continue the story hereon out. 

Those funds will be used to commission cg artists, music composers, bg artists, and a writing editor to further improve the game.

After all, It's a lot of work drawing, writing and coding solo and I still need my time.(I'm still below 20 lol)

But then again, it still will all depend on the views about the game.

Q: "Will I pay for the full game once it's finished?"

I want the game to be free for everyone, and I'd like to keep it that way. But like I said, It will still depend. I can't promise you anything yet.

Credits

A lot of the music I used is from YT audio library, a lot of talented composers there.

VN Audio Pack Composer/Sound Designer: Tim Reichert Vocalist & Lyricist
